page.title: 05Home Life in Alton (2)
page.content:
This survey was conducted with a sample of 71 Alton households.
How many people in your home are vegetarians? 0..........83% 3..........3% 1.......... 9% 4..........1% 2.......... 4%
Does your home have a daily newspaper? Yes ...........70% No...........30%
How many television sets are there in your home? 0.....0% 1.....24% 2.....31% 3.....25% 4 or more......20%
Does your home have one of these? Record Player..100% Computer..51% Tape Recorder..100% Electronic Organ..48% Video Recorder. 68% Piano..23%
